card.description: This dataset contains various attributes of different abalone, a type of marine snails. The goal is to predict the number of rings in the abalone's shell, which is an indicator of its age.

context.createdBy: Warwick J Nash, Tracy L Sellers, Simon R Talbot, Andrew J Cawthorn and Wes B Ford
context.potentialUses: Determine the age of an abalone.

fields.description: The sex of the abalone: M, F, or I (Infant)
Its length at the longest point in millimeters.
Its height with the snail in the shell in millimeters.
The weight of the entire abalone in grams.
The weight of the snail with the shell removed in grams.
The weight of the viscera, in grams.
The weight of the shell after being dried, in grams.
